alert.note: Alert for Madison; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 8:20PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tensas and southeastern Madison Parishes, southern Warren, northeastern Claiborne and southwestern Hinds Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 820 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Yokena, or 16 miles southwest of Vicksburg, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vicksburg, Raymond, Edwards, Bolton, Reganton, Le Tourneau, Newman, Yokena and Learned. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and central, southwestern and west central Mississippi.
